query: SELECT m.id, m.firstName, m.lastName, COUNT(g.id) as gallery_count FROM memorials m LEFT JOIN galleryItems g ON m.id = g.memorialId GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.id DESC;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3vgeacBXQskVuAu.root --database 7BQi4QLKtagJxsmsYisuwg --execute SELECT m.id, m.firstName, m.lastName, COUNT(g.id) as gallery_count FROM memorials m LEFT JOIN galleryItems g ON m.id = g.memorialId GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.id DESC;
